resources.string: WiliotAndroidSDK
Go to settings
“Wiliot App” Would like to Use Bluetooth
“Wiliot App” needs Bluetooth to be turned on
We use Bluetooth for communication with pixels and bridges
“Wiliot App” Would like to Use Location
We use location to locate and know how far pixels are from you

This app collects location data to enable correct location-based events generation even when the app is closed or not in use. Please, enable background location access to send necessary data to the Wiliot Cloud.
“Wiliot App” Would like to Use Background Location
“Wiliot App” Would like to Enable GPS
Allow
“Wiliot App” Would like to Enable Internet Adapter
We use Internet to resolve Beacons data
“Wiliot App” Would like to Disable Battery optimisation
We should to disable Battery Optimisation in order to prevent Background Service from being killed by Operation System
“Wiliot App” Would like to Access the Camera
Scanning QR and Barcodes is done with a camera.
“Wiliot App” Would like to Access Writing to External Storage
You should allow Access for writing Files to the External Storage in order to Download Firmwares and other files that is necessary for Application to work
“LivingWeb App” would like to use Notifications
You should allow Notifications in order to make background services of the app work stable
Error occurred
Something went wrong
OK
Done
Cancel
Retry
